C

calculateRotate() - Method in class shellshocker.Barrel
Calculates the amount that the barrel must rotate in order to match the position of the mouse.
canMoveDown(ArrayList<Boundary>, ArrayList<EnemySprite>, ArrayList<Reactor>) - Method in class shellshocker.Ragnar
 
canMoveLeft(ArrayList<Boundary>, ArrayList<EnemySprite>, ArrayList<Reactor>) - Method in class shellshocker.Ragnar
Checks to find whether or not the main character can move to the left. Potential objects that inhibit movement include walls, platforms, doors, and enemies.
canMoveRight(ArrayList<Boundary>, ArrayList<EnemySprite>, ArrayList<Reactor>) - Method in class shellshocker.Ragnar
 
canMoveUp(ArrayList<Boundary>, ArrayList<EnemySprite>, ArrayList<Reactor>) - Method in class shellshocker.Ragnar
 
checkBombs() - Method in class shellshocker.ControlCentral
Checks to see if bombs have detonated be comparing locations.Bombs that have hit boundaries or enemies will detonate.
checkCheckPoints() - Method in class shellshocker.ControlCentral
Sets the checkpoint statistic of the user-controlled vehicle when the specified locations have been reached.
checkHit() - Method in class shellshocker.ControlCentral
Checks to see if mines can be detonated be contact with enemy entities.
checkHitBox() - Method in class shellshocker.ControlCentral
Checks to see whether the user-controlled character has hit a box object.
checkHitFlame() - Method in class shellshocker.ControlCentral
Checks to see if enemies have made contact with the damaging flamethrower weapon of the user-controlled character.
checkRange() - Method in class shellshocker.ControlCentral
Checks to see if all projectiles fired have impacted other objects, such as boundaries, other enemies, or the user-controlled character, in order to simulate realistic conditions.
checkRemoveEnemy() - Method in class shellshocker.ControlCentral
Checks to remove all enemies that have health levels less than or equal to 0 to simulate death conditions.
ControlCentral - Class in shellshocker
Runs the ShellShocker game by drawing graphics, creating a user-controlled weapon and character control system, and logic system for movement of all items in the game. Called by class TheGame.
ControlCentral() - Constructor for class shellshocker.ControlCentral
Default constructor for class. Makes calls to different classes to create features of the game such as the user-controlled vehicle, platforms, enemies, and weapons.
createProfiles() - Method in class shellshocker.TheGame
Creates profiles from a stored file.
createScoreBoard() - Static method in class shellshocker.TheGame
Creates a score board list from a saved file that is later presented to the user at the end of the game.
